blogPost.excerpt: Get inside the minds of top Product Leaders from Netflix, Amazon and Spotify with these templates covering the nine most common Product Management scenarios — presented by Product School, MURAL and Coda.
blogPost.body: Get inside the minds of top Product Leaders from Netflix, Amazon and Spotify with these templates covering the nine most common Product Management scenarios — presented by Product School, MURAL and Coda.
blogPost.title: Product Management Templates - 9 essential templates created by product leaders
blogPost.author: Shishir Mehrotra

localize.description: 通过这些模板进入Netflix、亚马逊和Spotify的顶级产品负责人的思维，这些模板涵盖了九种最常见的产品管理场景--由Product School、MURAL和Coda提出。
localize.tagline: 产品负责人打造的9个必备模板

localize.description: 通過這些模板進入Netflix、亞馬遜和Spotify的頂級產品負責人的思維，這些模板涵蓋了九種最常見的產品管理場景--由Product School、MURAL和Coda提出。
localize.tagline: 產品負責人打造的9個必備模板

previous.excerpt: As a newsletter creator, finding paying sponsors is hard! Swapstack is a marketplace connecting brands & writers to run paid sponsorships. ✍️ As a writer: Work with brands your readers love. 💼 As a brand: Work with writers who speak to your audience.
previous.title: Swapstack - A marketplace connecting newsletters & brands

localize.description: 作为一个通讯创作者，寻找付费赞助是很难的！Swapstack是一个连接品牌和作家的市场，可以提供付费赞助。Swapstack是一个连接品牌和作者的市场，让他们进行付费赞助。✍️作为一名作家。与你的读者喜欢的品牌合作。💼 作为一个品牌。与能与你的读者对话的作家合作。
localize.tagline: 连接新闻通讯和品牌的市场

localize.description: 作爲一個通訊創作者，尋找付費贊助是很難的！Swapstack是一個連接品牌和作家的市場，可以提供付費贊助。Swapstack是一個連接品牌和作者的市場，讓他們進行付費贊助。✍️作爲一名作家。與你的讀者喜歡的品牌合作。💼 作爲一個品牌。與能與你的讀者對話的作家合作。
localize.tagline: 連接新聞通訊和品牌的市場

next.excerpt: Greg is a simple app that will coach you to grow healthy, happier plants. ⠀ Greg uses insights from plant physics to train machine learning algorithms so you know when to water each of your plants, in whichever environment they’re in.
next.title: Greg 🌱 - Grow healthy and happier plants

localize.description: Greg是一款简单的应用程序，它将指导你种植健康、快乐的植物。⠀ Greg利用植物物理学的见解来训练机器学习算法，这样你就能知道什么时候给你的每一株植物浇水，无论它们在什么环境中。
localize.tagline: 种植健康和快乐的植物

localize.description: Greg是一款簡單的應用程序，它將指導你種植健康、快樂的植物。⠀ Greg利用植物物理學的見解來訓練機器學習算法，這樣你就能知道什麼時候給你的每一株植物澆水，無論它們在什麼環境中。
localize.tagline: 種植健康和快樂的植物
